video.title: Web application security: 10 things developers need to know
video.description:
Security is an important topic for developers however security is often an afterthought in a project. This presentation will focus on practices which developers need to be aware of, and make security fun again. This is an in depth talk about 10 topics, not an overview for security best practices.

Talk by Nanne Baars at the Voxxed Days Vienna 2018 conference.

Thanks to Devoxx for giving us permission to post this talk. freeCodeCamp is not associated with this talk. We're just excited to bring more exposure to to it!

--

Learn to code for free and get a developer job: https://www.freecodecamp.com

Read hundreds of articles on programming: https://medium.freecodecamp.com

topLevelComment.author: Rabia Riaz
topLevelComment.text: You should discuss about XSS as well as you did for SQLi.....

topLevelComment.author: Scott Knight
topLevelComment.text:
Once I get my Ph.D. in software development, I'll watch this again. 

I'm sure there is great info, but it's clear you would already have to be an expert to understand.

topLevelComment.author: JS64
topLevelComment.text: Not being able to see where he is pointing makes it a lot harder to follow this presentation.

topLevelComment.author: sam
topLevelComment.text: I'm gonna have to watch this again with a notepad. Unbelievable amount of info packed into a 1 hour talk!

topLevelComment.author: angel jo
topLevelComment.text: your voice is shaking.please breathe and talk

topLevelComment.author: Daniel Delaney
topLevelComment.text: very informative, a wealth of knowledge, thank you!
